lines.text: Poor Benson. If they opened up his chest, they'd find a formula... where his heart should have been.
George, those meteorites are messing up everything!
Whatta expect on an August night?

[Reacting to the commotion in the observatory]
What's happening, Reynolds?
One would say, ladies and gentlemen, that you are disappointed to learn that the end of the world has been postponed!

[Speaking of "The Outsider"]
Professor, you act as if it's your personal property.
Human feelings are inconsistent . In fact, they're the only inconsistent elements in all nature.
Most things happen unexpectedly, even the apocalypse!
